subject: Congratulations! Your email ad
body:
Congratulations! Your email address has been selected to receive a
$10,000,000.00 Donation Fund.
Dear Sir/Madam
Congratulations from the Jeff Skoll Philanthropies Foundation, where
life changing opportunities and cash are given out on a daily basis.
Our Founder has indeed been a great philanthropist to this generation
and is truly committed to giving while living.
We are therefore pleased to inform you that you are one of the lucky
people to benefit and receive $10,000,000.00 USD from our Foundation's ongoing
goodwill project (Grant/Donations Program). Is this message sent to a valid e
mail account? 
Your email account was randomly selected from a massive pool to
receive a cash donation of $10,000,000.00 from the Foundation.
Kindly provide the listed information below for your funds payment
If this is a valid email account, kindly contact Att. Raymond  Arner
(Attorney / Payment Supervisor) via (
arnerraymond@gmail.com
), for
more comprehensive information.
Happy New Year in Advance.
Sincerely,
Mrs. Shirley Williamson,
Director, Jeff Skoll Philanthropic Foundation.

subject: Re: Congratulations! Your email ad
body:
Dear Mrs. Shirley,

Thank you for reaching out to me and considering me as one of the lucky recipients of the Donation Fund from Jeff Skoll. I must say, it sounds like a wonderful opportunity.

Before proceeding further, I would like to confirm the authenticity of this email. Can you please provide some additional information about the ongoing goodwill project Grant Donations Program? I am curious to know more about how it works and what criteria were used to select me as a recipient.

Also, could you please clarify what specific information you require from me in order to process the funds payment? I want to make sure that everything is in order before proceeding.

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Daniel
